name: Morendar: Goblin Slayer
description: Goblins have tunneled into the catacombs beneath the castles of the land. The tribes are taking up residence and soon their numbers will overflow and pour into the surrounding towns. Defend your people and cleanse the filth now populating the depths below.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core i5 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
